caption: cyRespond to a property possession claim
noticeDateLabel: cyWhen did you receive notice from {{claimantName}} (Optional)?
noticeDateHint: cyFor example, 27 9 2022. If you’re not sure of the exact date, you can find it on the notice
paragraph: cy{{claimantName}} did not provide the date they served you notice.

date.notRealDate: cyDate of notice must be a real date
date.futureDate: cyThe date you received notice must either be today’s date or in the past
date.invalidValue: cyDate of notice must be a real date
date.missingOne: cyYour date of notice must include a {{missingField}}
date.missingTwo: cyYour date of notice must include a {{first}} and {{second}}
